snippet: Rush Limbaugh will soon have a new radio rival: Mike Huckabee, who will be running a radio show from noon to 3 p.m. for Cumulus Media Networks.
abstract: Former Arkansas Gov Mike Huckabee will host a weekday talk radio show for Cumulus Media Networks; new show will not interfere with his weekend television program on Fox News Channel.
lead_paragraph: Rush Limbaugh will soon have a new radio rival: Mike Huckabee, who will be running a radio show from noon to 3 p.m. for Cumulus Media Networks.

headline.seo: Mike Huckabee to Begin Radio Show
headline.main: New Huckabee Radio Show Could Vie With Limbaugh
headline.print_headline: New Huckabee Radio Show Could Vie With Limbaugh
